content: After activating the first of the Keeper's Shrines, face away from it and head to the right. Go down the stairs and to the end of the path to find a Meditation Spot.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_5_Secret-Bishui_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 5 Secret - Bishui Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Purge Pit'.
The content is as follows:
After activating the first of the Keeper's Shrines, face away from it and head to the right. Go down the stairs and to the end of the path to find a Meditation Spot.
